dyeHardProceduralAPI

Class ApiEnemyGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • dyeHardProceduralAPI.ApiEnemyGenerator

  • public class ApiEnemyGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    ApiEnemyGenerator is a supporting class for DyeHard Procedural API, which is responsible for generating enemies in game.
    Author:
    Holden, Nin
